dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-M3065409X] http://commerzb.com/
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:47:23 p.m. (GMT-6) on
February 14, 2007.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 13, 2007 8:38 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-M3065409X] http://commerzb.com/

Everyones Internet 
390 Benmar 
Suite 200 
Houston, TX 
US 
 
Feb 13,2007 
 
Re:  http://commerzb.com/ 
IP Addresses: 66.98.249.6 
 
To Whom It May Concern:  
 
The purpose of this letter is to notify Everyones Internet, as 
the Internet service provider for the above referenced domain, that 
the content it is hosting on http://commerzb.com/ infringes upon 
the proprietary materials, including brands and copyrights, of 
Citizens Financial Group, Inc. and/or its applicable subsidiaries and 
affiliates (collectively, "Citizens"), and that Citizens has cause to 
believe that http://commerzb.com/ is intended, or is being used, 
to fraudulently capture the identity, account and/or log-in 
information of Citizens' customers. 
 
The content hosted on http://commerzb.com/ is essentially 
identical to the trademarked and copyrighted material located at 
www.natwest.com, a domain owned and operated by Citizens, 
and in no event was such use authorized by Citizens, its agents or the 
law.  Use of such content on www.natwest.com is an 
infringement of Citizens' proprietary rights and is a clear violation 
of applicable Federal and State copyright and trademark laws. 
According to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), an 
Internet service provider may avoid liability for infringement only 
if, upon notice of the infringement, the Internet service provider 
"responds expeditiously to remove, or disable access to, the material 
claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity." 
17 USCA
